forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
This afternoon, Downtown San Francisco basks under a broad expanse of blue sky, offering a serene contrast to the bustling streets below. The gentle warmth brushes against one's skin, yet the robust west wind carries an invigorating chill, reminding us of the city’s ever-changing mood. As the day edges into evening, there is a whisper of clouds gathering in, hinting at the possibility of some light drizzle later on—a delicate embrace from the marine layer drifting over the Golden Gate. Right now, the city looks inviting, though one may sense the cool breath of the ocean in the air, calling for a light jacket or a cozy scarf as twilight approaches.

With the sun beginning its descent, the promise of an evening walk through the well-lit streets beckons. Consider a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the vibrant colors of sunset reflect upon the bay, or perhaps a quiet read in one of the local cafés, where the aroma of fresh coffee mingles with the chatter of neighbors. It is a moment to savor, to step outside and relish the dynamic weather, an experience unique to this singular city.
